Dragos and Hix five companions Leads Denzabar back into the Maximal Base's control room. 
Dragos:
" here you go the best you can do right now is be our eyes." He states while pointing to the monitors. : use your brains to develope a type of Communications device for us. Our coms seems to be out, that would be best for you bro." as Dragos hands Denzabar back his hammer. " We are friends not foe's and we could use your help in trying to get Communications back online."

Gimliyotoden@... wrote:
Denzabarfollowed,unsure of the situation.
